Name: FROM FEAR
About the game: FROM FEAR is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror where you choose your fear. Collect resources, unlock new maps and tools, all while trying to stay alive. CHOOSE YOUR FEAR Fear is personal - Choose your own and let the game adapt to your fear. Monster and loot determined by fear. Unique experiences, even across multiplayer. THE MONSTER Hide from your fear - Stay out of their way or be hunted down. Unpredictable AI - No game will be the same. Use the environment to lure the monster. COLLECT RESOURCES Collect resources to unlock new maps and characters. Items found are broken down into one or more resources. Find the fuel or remain stranded. Discover keys to unlock new areas. 1-4 PLAYER ONLINE CO-OP Face your fears alone or with friends - Will you help or leave them behind? Heal wounded allies or let them bleed out. When cornered, use your friends as bait.
